info.description:
A high-performance email verification system with microservices architecture

This API provides comprehensive email verification services including:
- Syntax validation and role-based detection
- Domain validation with DNS and MX record checking
- SMTP server connectivity and capability detection
- Inbox existence verification
- Bulk email verification with task management
- Proxy management for distributed verification
- Role pattern and disposable domain management
info.title: Email Verification API

get.description: Returns all active API keys for the authenticated user

post.description: Generates a new API key for the authenticated user. The plaintext key is returned only once and must be saved securely.

delete.description: Soft-deletes and deactivates an API key. Only the key owner can revoke it.

get.description: Get a paginated list of all disposable domains

post.description: Create a new disposable domain entry

400.description: Invalid request (validation errors, invalid domain format)

post.description: Create multiple disposable domains in a single request (max 100)

delete.description: Delete multiple disposable domains in a single request (max 100)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific disposable domain

400.description: Invalid request (validation errors, invalid domain format)

get.description: Get a paginated list of all verified domains with their validation results

parameters.description: Number of domains to return per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of domains to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of associations to preload. Allowed values: DNSRecords, Emails, Hosts
parameters.name: preloads

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific domain validation result by name

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of associations to preload. Allowed values: DNSRecords, Emails, Hosts
parameters.name: preloads

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific domain validation result

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of associations to preload. Allowed values: DNSRecords, Emails, Hosts
parameters.name: preloads

get.description: Get a paginated list of all verified emails with their verification results

parameters.description: Number of emails to return per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of emails to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific email verification result by email address
Get detailed information about a specific email verification result
Get a paginated list of proxies with optional filtering

parameters.description: Number of proxies to return per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of proxies to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Filter by protocol (socks5, http, https, ssh)
parameters.name: protocol

parameters.description: Filter by maximum response time in milliseconds
parameters.name: max_response_time

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return
parameters.name: fields

post.description: Create a new proxy configuration for email verification with optional connectivity testing

400.description: Invalid request (validation errors, connectivity test failed)

409.description: Proxy with same host/port already exists

post.description: Create multiple proxy configurations in a single request

delete.description: Delete multiple proxies in a single request

post.description: Import multiple proxies from a text file. Each line should be in format: USERNAME:PASSWORD@HOST:PORT

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific proxy

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return (e.g., 'id,host,port')
parameters.name: fields

400.description: Invalid proxy ID or field requested

put.description: Update an existing proxy configuration with optional connectivity testing

400.description: Invalid request (validation errors, connectivity test failed)

409.description: Proxy with same host/port already exists

get.description: Get a paginated list of role patterns with optional filtering by category, domain, or active status

parameters.description: Number of patterns to return per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of patterns to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Create a new role pattern for role-based email detection

put.description: Update multiple role patterns in a single request

post.description: Create multiple role patterns in a single request

delete.description: Delete multiple role patterns in a single request

post.description: Force a refresh of the role pattern cache to reload all active patterns

get.description: Get information about the role-based detector status including refresh time and pattern count
Get detailed information about a specific role pattern
Get a paginated list of all verification tasks

parameters.description: Number of tasks to return per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of tasks to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Creates a new task for bulk email verification with a maximum of 10,000 emails per task. Emails are grouped by domain and queued for processing. Optionally configure a webhook URL to receive notifications when verification completes.

requestBody.description: Task creation request with emails, optional user ID, and optional webhook URL

400.description: Invalid request (exceeds 10,000 email limit, invalid emails, malformed UUID, invalid webhook URL)

500.description: Internal server error during task creation

post.description: Upload a file containing email addresses for batch verification. File size limit and allowed formats are determined by server configuration. Returns immediately with upload confirmation while processing happens in background.
post.summary: Upload file for batch email verification

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific task including all email verification job results with email, host, and domain relationships

post.description: Performs real-time verification of a single email address with comprehensive validation including syntax, domain, SMTP, and inbox checks
